transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Bharat sir good morning, Parvej bol raha hu IndiaMART se account manager.
Customer: Ha sir boliye.
Executive: Kaise hai sir aap?
Customer: Boliye sir thoda kaam me hu bataiye na.
Executive: Nahi actually main call kar raha tha sir aapka balance payment jo pending hai na aaj due ja raha hai aaj ki date me to usko aaj ho sakta hai clear karwa de agar aap.
Customer: Aaj to nahi hoga sir.
Executive: Ye agle week me le leta hu sir.
Executive: Agle Monday ko karwayenge aap matlab.
Customer: Monday ko nahi ek do din wo week me ek do din me chalu hote hi karwa denge.
Executive: Accha accha, theek hai sir agar jitna jaldi possible ho na wo aap kara dijiye kyuki aapka ek ticket open hai outstanding amount balance payment pending karke.
Customer: Theek hai usko hame fir aapke account se close karna hoga. To kya hua sir usme to kya kar denge na mana thodi kar rahe hai.
Executive: Sir nahi nahi sir maine kaha aapko bola ki aap mana kar rahe hai aap nahi kar rahe hai. Aapne picture dal diya?
Customer: Kya keh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Wo picture bheja tha wo dala aapne?
Executive: Nahi aapko Google meet pe connect hona padega sir, kaunsi picture kis me kaunsi category me aur kaunse product name me jayengi. Maine aapko kal hi bola tha aap jaise hi free ho jayiyega aap mujhe connect kar lijiyega.
Customer: Usi me dal do na fir me le lunga na.
Executive: Kya keh rahe hai sir?
Customer: Usi me aap catalog me khali le lo baki me apne hisab se dal dunga na.
Executive: Ha to theek hai aap jaisa bole.
Executive: Theek hai. Baki sir isko to main kar hi dunga. Mere ko dikhe aisa rakh do fir me apne hisab se setting kar lunga.
Executive: Aur kya keh rahe ho sir aap?
Customer: Aapko yaar hamara product ka to pata hai na kaunsi product hum chalate hai. Nahi nahi wo to aap chalate hai wo to pata hi hai. But sir imaging. Aapko me wahi bol raha hu catalog me mere ko show kare aise picture dikha do khali. Aapko dalna nahi hai product me ki is product kiski hai.
Executive: Aisa matlab wo kisi me bhi dal do baki aap wo kar lo.
Customer: Kyu kisi me dal do le.
Executive: Nahi nahi isiliye to keh raha hu sir jitni aapne photo bheji hai wo sari ki sari ek hi product ki hai.
Customer: To mera agla to usne mere paas kuch bhi manga apne hisab se hi dal diya tha usne.
Executive: Ha to main chahunga sir ki aap is cheez pe na connect ho. Matlab agar main khud se sari cheeze karunga to shayad ho sakta hai idhar udhar ho jaye cheeze. To jyada nahi 5-10 minute ke time nikal lijiye aaj jab bhi aap free ho.
Customer: Me 8:30 9:00 baje sham ko karu to chalega?
Executive: Are sir tab to nahi sir I'm sorry matlab tab to hamara 6:30 baje tak to main available rahunga office me. Subah me 8:30 baje 9:00 baje karu to?
Executive: Aap 9:30 baje kar sakte hai.
Customer: 9:30 baje to mera duty chalu ho jata hai sir. Accha accha accha. To 10 minute ka sir time to nikal lijiye agar ho sake to lunch wunch me thoda sa. Nahi nahi office pe jata hu na office pe jata hu to time nikal ke de deta hu aapko.
Executive: Theek hai aap jab bhi matlab. Bataya na usi time me baithta hu.
Executive: Ha ha bataya tha aapne bilkul. To aapko jab bhi aapko lage ki ye main free hu to mujhe aap turant call kar lijiyega. Sham ke time kar sakta hu kya subah ke time kar sakta hu aap bataiye kaunsa time karu. Aap sham me kar lijiye koi dikkat nahi hai.
Customer: Ha to sham ko me aapko call back karunga theek hai. Theek hai sir done sir done okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has a pending balance payment.

- Customer needs help with product catalog pictures.

- Customer wants to know product details.



Resolution:

- Customer will clear the payment next week.

- Executive offered assistance with catalog setup via Google Meet.

- Executive agreed to customer uploading pictures himself.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will call back in the evening.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- payment, catalog, product, google meet, pictures
